summary: The module defines a neural network class that implements the WaveGlow flow‑based vocoder. It transforms raw audio waveforms to and from latent Gaussian distributions conditioned on mel‑spectra, using invertible 1×1 convolutions and WaveNet‑style residual blocks. It provides training and inference pathways, supports model export, and can strip weight‑norm layers for efficient deployment.
business_intent: Provide a high‑quality, fast neural vocoder for text‑to‑speech pipelines and streamline its deployment in production environments.
